body_html: My company has been working on OpenCL deep learning for a while and we have some early results to show. We are focusing on Keras in the near term however we also have built (very) experimental TensorFlow support and will revisit that after our initial release. More details here including initial throughput numbers on AMD: http://vertex.ai/blog/bringing-deep-learning-to-opencl
